Warranty claims and the long-term reliability of new technologies integrated into the XUV 3XO also need careful consideration.

nodes.agent_prompt: Fetch details on the features of the Mahindra XUV 3XO. Use iterative searches to compile information from various sources. Limit to 4 iterations and return all findings in a structured format.

code.CODE_1:
results = search_web_with_text_content('Mahindra XUV 3XO features specifications', 8)
output = {'xuv_3xo_features': results}
code.CODE_2:
results = search_web_with_text_content('Mahindra XUV 3XO engine safety interior exterior technology', 6)
output = {'xuv_3xo_features': results}
code.CODE_3:
results = search_web_with_text_content('Mahindra XUV 3XO unique selling points features', 5)
output = {'xuv_3xo_features': results}

18.40 Lakh On road price, Delhi Delhi Starting 13,193 /month EMI calculator Get EMI offers Enquire now Mahindra XUV 3XO highlights The XUV 3XO gets two petrol and one diesel engine option. The entry-level XUV 3XO gets a 1.2-liter turbo MPFI petrol engine while the higher variants come with a 1.2-liter turbo direct injection petrol. Additionally, there is a 1.5-liter diesel engine on offer on the XUV 3XO as well. Mahindra XUV 3XO on road price starts from Rs 8.50 lakh going upto Rs 17.84 lakh for the top model diesel automatic variant. The more powerful petrol engine on offer on the XUV 3XO is the 1.2 TGDI version that churns out a healthy 130hp and 230Nm. It can be opted with either a six-speed manual or a six-speed automatic. Mahindra XUV 3XO mileage for the 1.2 TGDI petrol ranges from 20.1kpl for the manual and 18.2kpl for the automatic. This engine is available on the XUV 3XO AX5 L, the AX7 and the AX7 L variants. 5-star Bharat NCAP Safety Rating Compact SUV of the Year: Autocar Awards 2025 Mahindra XUV 3XO standout features Mahindra XUV 3XO is the widest in its segment, measuring 1821 mm has the longest wheelbase at 2600 mm, and stands 1647 mm tall. It has a ground clearance of 201 mm. It gets two petrol and one diesel option. The 1.2 litre MPFI petrol engine produces 110 Hp and 200 Nm while the fancier TGDI produces 130 Hp and 230 Nm. The diesel mill comes with a 1.5 litre turbo and produces 115 Hp and 300 Nm. The automatic diesel is only offered with an AMT transmission. Sunroof Mahindra XUV 3XO key specifications The Mahindra XUV 3XO offers a choice of three engines: 1.2L turbo petrol with 110 PS, 1.2L TGDi turbo petrol with 130 PS, and 1.5L diesel with 117 PS, paired with manual, AMT, and 6-speed torque converter options. It features a spacious 385-litre boot, a 10.25-inch touchscreen, and a panoramic sunroof which is the widest in the segment. With over 60 connected car features and Level 2 ADAS, it is a tech-loaded compact SUV.
